original_title: UVERworld KING'S PARADE 2017 Saitama Super Arena
overview: This is a recording of UVERworld's 9th men-only show, known as "Otoko Matsuri," held at Saitama Super Arena in February 2017. It offers a glimpse into the frenzy of the audience of 23,000, the largest in the artist's history.
title: UVERworld KING'S PARADE 2017 Saitama Super Arena
